statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 500 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY sale_id
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY product_id
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 123 OR product_id = 456 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 500 AND product_id NOT IN (789, 890) ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_date, quantity, sales_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_data;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data INNER JOIN product_data ON sales_data.product_id = product_data.product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data JOIN product_data ON sales_data.product_id = product_data.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, category, unit_price FROM sales_data JOIN product_data ON sales_data.product_id = product_data.product_id WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY unit_price ASC;

SELECT product_name, category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data JOIN product_data ON sales_data.product_id = product_data.product_id GROUP BY product_name, category HAVING total_quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT ROUND(AVG(unit_price), 2) AS avg_unit_price, MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales_amount FROM sales_data JOIN product_data ON sales_data.product_id = product_data.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM Sales;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Sales WHERE total_amount > 1000);
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM Sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.category = 'Electronics';
SELECT SUM(price * quantity) AS total_sales FROM sales_data;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND brand IN ('Nike', 'Adidas', 'Puma');
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_date, total_price, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, category FROM suppliers, products WHERE suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, total_price ASC
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT supplier_name, city, country FROM suppliers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_details GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
